name: Lapland (NEDNAR)
description:
Lapland is a game created for the first GeekBrains gamejam.

You're playing as an elf trying his best to build some toys before Christmas comes. However, it seems like some parts are missing, and you'll need to build the toys using whatever you might find around the factory.

Features:

  • Low-Poly graphics
  • Funky music by Offenbach
  • Strange and elves
  • Toy building mechanics including 3 different toys:
    • Gun (Easy)
    • Horse (Medium)
    • Car (Hard)

Creators:

  • NEDNAR - Code
  • Jevlogin - Code
  • World of Gaya - Game design
  • Hits - 3D models
  • Lawrakina - QA
  • MZmeevskii - Code and visuals
